Load Circuit Info

Source: R/load_circuits.R
load_circuits.Rd

Loads circuit info for all circuits in a given season. Use .load_circuits() for an uncached version of this function

load_circuits(season = get_current_season())

Arguments

season

number from 1950 to current season (defaults to current season).

Value

A tibble with one row per circuit

Examples

# Load the circuits used this season:
load_circuits()
#> # A tibble: 22 × 6
#>    circuit_id  circuit_name                   lat      long     locality country
#>    <chr>       <chr>                          <chr>    <chr>    <chr>    <chr>  
#>  1 albert_park Albert Park Grand Prix Circuit -37.8497 144.968  Melbour… Austra…
#>  2 americas    Circuit of the Americas        30.1328  -97.6411 Austin   USA    
#>  3 bahrain     Bahrain International Circuit  26.0325  50.5106  Sakhir   Bahrain
#>  4 baku        Baku City Circuit              40.3725  49.8533  Baku     Azerba…
#>  5 catalunya   Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya 41.57    2.26111  Montmeló Spain  
#>  6 hungaroring Hungaroring                    47.5789  19.2486  Budapest Hungary
#>  7 interlagos  Autódromo José Carlos Pace     -23.7036 -46.6997 São Pau… Brazil 
#>  8 jeddah      Jeddah Corniche Circuit        21.6319  39.1044  Jeddah   Saudi …
#>  9 losail      Losail International Circuit   25.49    51.4542  Al Daay… Qatar  
#> 10 marina_bay  Marina Bay Street Circuit      1.2914   103.864  Marina … Singap…
#> # ℹ 12 more rows

# Load the circuits used in 1972:
load_circuits(1972)
#> # A tibble: 12 × 6
#>    circuit_id    circuit_name                  lat      long    locality country
#>    <chr>         <chr>                         <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>

#>  2 charade       Charade Circuit               45.7472  3.03889 Clermon… France 
#>  3 galvez        Autódromo Juan y Oscar Gálvez -34.6943 -58.45… Buenos … Argent…
#>  4 jarama        Jarama                        40.6171  -3.585… Madrid   Spain  
#>  5 kyalami       Kyalami                       -25.9894 28.0767 Midrand  South …
#>  6 monaco        Circuit de Monaco             43.7347  7.42056 Monte-C… Monaco 
#>  7 monza         Autodromo Nazionale di Monza  45.6156  9.28111 Monza    Italy  
#>  8 mosport       Mosport International Raceway 44.0481  -78.67… Ontario  Canada 
#>  9 nivelles      Nivelles-Baulers              50.6211  4.32694 Brussels Belgium
